metadata.title: CVE-2016-5857 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm SPCom driver in Android before 7.0 allows local users toexecute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 34386529 and Qualcomm internal bugCR#1094140.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
